global_caption: a scene featuring an old man with white hair wearing a black beret and a grey cardigan with two black buttons, wearing dark blue pants and black shoes, looking left and a bit short, wearing a white shirt beneath the cardigan; a slightly brown woman with black hair that comes to her shoulders, smiling and looking slightly left, wearing a flower-patterned one-piece dress and white sandals, laying her left hand on top of the right hand of the man to her left who is holding a basket; a man with dark brown hair wearing a blue t-shirt and beige shorts, wearing black sandals, holding a large dark plate with lots of water bottles on it in his left hand, and holding a brown basket up to his waist with his right hand; and a small yellow-brown girl holding a yellow balloon in her left hand and a brown teddy bear in her right hand, wearing a pink sleeveless t-shirt and a white skirt that comes to her knees, wearing pink sneakers, looking slightly to her right.
